name: Elemental Worlds
description:
Elemental Worlds is a third person game perspective, where the player can use elemental skills like:
Stone: To move other stones
Air: To freeze lava and Fire which is for the next version.
The player can explore 3 worlds and complete  puzzles to restore the connections between them.
Shortcuts
W,A,S,D - Walk
Space - jump
Left Mouse Button - Select/Interact
Tab - go to the ship

This game was made as an entry to DevSquad Academy Jam 2020 with the theme of 'Connected Worlds'.
